content: मानस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मन एव, मनस इदं वा अण्] {@--1@} Pertaining to the mind, mental, spiritual (<ab>opp.</ab> शारीर). {@--2@} Produced from the mind, sprung at will; ब्रह्मणो मानसपुत्राः; किं मानसी सृष्टिः <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 18</ls>; <ls>Bg. 10. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Only to be conceived in the mind, conceivable. {@--4@} Tacit, implied. {@--5@} Dwelling on the lake Mānasa. --सः A form of Viṣṇu. --सं {@--1@} The mind, heart, soul; सपदि मदनानलो दहति मम मानसं <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; अपि च मानसमंबुनिधिः <ls>Bv. 1. 113</ls>; मानसं विषयैर्विना (भाति) <ls n="Bv. 1.">116.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sacred lake on the mountain Kailāsa; (कैलासशिखरे राम मनसा निर्मितं सरः . ब्रह्मणा प्रागिदं यस्मात्तदभून्मानसं सरः .. <ls>Rām.</ls>; it is said to be the native place of swans, who are described as migrating to its shores every year at the commencement of the breeding season or the monsoons; मेघश्यामा दिशो दृष्ट्वा मानसोत्सुकचेतसां . कूजितं राजहंसानां नेदं नूपुरशिंजितं <ls>V. 4. 14</ls>, <ls n="V. 4.">15</ls>; यस्यास्तोये कृतवसतयो मानसं संनिकृष्टं नाध्यास्यंति व्यपगतशुच त्वामपि प्रेक्ष्य हंसः <ls>Me. 76</ls>; see <ls>Me. 11</ls>; <ls>Ghaṭ. 9</ls> also); <ls>R. 6. 26</ls>; <ls>Me. 62.</ls> <ls>Bv. 1. 3.</ls> {@--3@} (In law) Tacit or implied consent. {@--4@} A kind of salt.
